Technical Data: 
--------------- 
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7 
Language: Multi and / or English / Spanish 
Format: ISO and / or Installer | Pack 

Description: 
------------ 
MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 17 Plus is the first video editing program in 3D. Edit your videos as usual in 2D, create stunning 3D movies captivate your audience, and the experience of the 4 th dimension of video editing: the speed! With MAGIX Movie Edit Pro fastest of all time, you get perfect results in an instant. Only MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 17 Plus provides a unique combination of powerful editing tools, templates, professional audio effects and dubbing extensive customization of individual choices. 

Transform the best of your video recordings into exciting theater-quality movies in an instant with MAGIX Video deluxe 17, including background music, animated transitions, titles and film-quality effects! Simply import the video into your PC, cut and edit as you want, and then record directly to disk - including professionally animated menus for DVD and Blu-ray. 

The modern features such as multicam editing for multiple cameras, secondary color correction sensational and completely reworked, professional DVD authoring and Blu-ray MAGIX Video deluxe 17 Plus Deluxe Best Video to date. 

- More than 1000 special effects cinematic transitions and templates included 
- Editor Dubbing Sound: Dolby Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Digital 5.1 and more Mixer 
- Full compatibility with HD for HDV and AVCHD 
- 99 tracks, multicamera editing, animation, travel route, and more 
- Submit your videos on TV, on the road or online 

More than 50 new features: 
- Improved performance when editing video 
- Faster loading video project 
- Upload videos directly to Facebook 
- AVCHD Import Wizard with preview function 
- Redesigned user interface with modern design 
- New export wizard design clear selection 
- Monitor captures video and monitor out the window of the monitor 
- Effects of Masks: Applying video effects to selected areas 
- Optimized memory usage on 64-bit 
- And much more ... 

NEW! Stereo3D: 
- World Premiere! Stereo3D Workflow 
- The full import functions for many models of 3D cameras 
- Edit your own recordings made in 3D, for example, with two cameras 
- Real 3D fades and titles for your video projects 3D 
- Preview and disposal of all conventional 3D display devices 
- The production in all formats (DVD, Blu-ray Disc, File, YouTube, etc) 

Import Formats: 
Video: AVI, DV-AVI, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, MPEG-4, MTS, M2TS, MXV, MJPEG, QuickTime, WMV (HD), MKV 
Audio: WAV, MP3, OGG, WMA, MIDI, Dolby Digital Stereo, Dolby Digital 5.1 
Images: JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIF, TGA (supports scanners and digital photo cameras [TWAIN]) 

Export formats. 
Video: AVI, DV-AVI, MJPEG, MPEG-1, MPEG-2, MPEG-4, QuickTime, WMV (HD) 
Audio: WAV, MP3, Dolby Digital Stereo, Dolby Digital 5.1 
Images: JPEG, BMP 

File Extensions (import). AVI, DAT, evo, m2v, m1v, h264, mpv, MPG, MPEG, MPEG2, mps, mp2, mpe, m2s ,.............. vdr,. rar,. mod. vro,. ts,. trp,. tp,. m2t,. mpt,. MMV. m2ts,. mts,. tod,. mov,. mp4,. DVR-MS. asf,. pva,. mp4,. MPEG4,. mpeg-4,. m4v, .3 gp, .3 g2 

Supported devices: 
- IEEE1394/FireWire/DV/i.Link interface for use with DV / HDV 
- USB camcorder (DVD / hard disk card / memory) and webcams 
- VfW or DirectShow-compatible video, TV or graphics cards with video input 
- WDM compatible TV tuner cards, DirectX9 and BDA driver compatible with DVB-T / S tuner cards 
- Blu-ray, DVD-R/RW, DVD + R / RW, DVD-RAM, CD-R/RW or burners 

System Requirements 
- Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7 
Minimum system requirements: 
- Intel Core Duo 1.83 GHz, AMD Dual-Core 2.0 GHz 
- 1 GB of RAM 
- 1 GB of hard disk space for program installation 
- Multi-channel sound card recommended for surround sound editing 
The minimum requirements for AVCHD / HD editing: 
- Intel Core 2 Quad 2.83 GHz (Intel Core i7 recommended) 
- 4 GB of RAM 
- DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card, min. 512 MB of space on the graphics card or ATI X300 and Pixelshader 2.0 or higher, NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better 
- Blu-ray to create Blu-ray 
System requirements for playing in 3D: 
- Red / Cyan anaglyph 3D glasses required for viewing (included). 
- A special monitor is needed to see with polarized glasses filter. 
- A 120 Hz monitor or projector and shutter glasses and are compatible graphics card required for reproduction of the shutter. 

Changes in version 10.0.10.2 
- Bug fix: the different transitions did not work properly between image objects 
- Correction of errors: problems importing animated GIF.
